Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits certain practices related to loot boxes
Summary: Prohibits a person offering loot boxes to consumers within the state to repurchase the contents of any such loot box whether directly themselves or indirectly through a third-party provider.
LawCode: Add ยง399-l, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibited practices related to loot boxes
